Text: i have two requests for you: Fallout New Vegas - All Roads, and Naughty and Nice: The Good Girl Art of Bruce Timm. thanks in advance!

blackcanary hooked you up with the 1st book, http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8272232/Fallout__New_Vegas_-_All_Roads_GN_%282010%29_%28Hawkwind-DCP%29

and i'd like to have that timm book, but i haven't found it anywhere. however, check out volume 3 of the modern masters series of books, it has quite a bit of his good girl art: http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7709272/Modern_Masters_%28Request%29
Hi there again, I have a request: can you please find and upload Saga Of A Doomed Universe? Thanks in advance :)
unfortunately Donkrieg1101, i can't find it. if it's been scanned or released digitally by a scan group, i'm not seeing it anywhere.
well that's a shame =.= Thanks anyway :)
no problem, i'll keep an eye out for it
